attributes.action: Launch an appeal for every houshold in the UK to donate £1.00 towards the people and business affected by the recent floods in Cumbria
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I would like the goverment to launch an appeal to help the people of Cumbria who have been affected by the recent floods. Many families and business have no flood insurance and it is time we as a country helped our fellow citizens by donating a minimum of £1.00 per household. To often we send money to foriegn disaster now is the time to look closer to home.
